metadata.title: CVE-2024-42133 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:Bluetooth: Ignore too large handle values in BIGhci_le_big_sync_established_evt is necessary to filter out cases where thehandle value is belonging to ida id range, otherwise ida will beerroneouslyreleased in hci_conn_cleanup.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
